snippet: A new form of the contraceptive Depo-Provera is being introduced in four African countries this year, and its backers hope that its simplicity may eventually allow women to inject themselves.
abstract: Easy-to-use form of injectable contraceptive Depo-Provera, known as Sayana Press, is being introduced in Burkina Faso, first of four African countries in which it will be rolled out.
lead_paragraph: A new form of the contraceptive Depo-Provera is being introduced in four African countries this year, and its backers hope that its simplicity may eventually allow women to inject themselves.

headline.print_headline: New Contraceptive Shot Being Released in Africa
headline.main: New Contraceptive Shot Being Released in Africa
